name: Pellego, Inc.
description: Flat fee firm focused on the 2.5m real estate agents who use their license part time. Beachhead market of real estate investors with an agent license. Growing at 100% per year (3 years in a row) with 13x LTV:CAC and $1m ARR.
one_liner: Flat fee firm focused on the 2.5m real estate agents who use their license part time. Beachhead market of real estate investors with an agent license. Growing at 100% per year (3 years in a row) with 13x LTV:CAC and $1m ARR.
